channel.title: ICloud Private Relay on

item.title: Safari No Connection
item.description: I just spent the past 45 minutes trying to troubleshoot an internet connection problem on my work computers… While trying to set up Tapbots new Mastodon client [Ivory][ivory], I couldn’t get the authentication page to load in Safari. My campus connection periodically experiences issues due to any number of things: campus network problems, campus IT problems, campus IT blocking my local router, problems with my local router,1 etc. In fact, I’ve been experiencing periodic issues all day.
